title: Pam's Ranch Chicken
description: Served with Roasted Broccoli & Baked Potato

refrigerator: Butter, sour cream, toppings (for baked potato)
pantry: Olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder (for broccoli)

sections.title: ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ³ Recipe
items: Preheat oven to 375Â°F. Spray a 9Ã—13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.
In a shallow plate, mix ranch dressing mix, parmesan cheese, and breadcrumbs.
Dredge chicken in mayo, then in breadcrumb mixture. Place in prepared dish.
Bake for 40 minutes, or until internal temperature hits 165Â°F.
Chop broccoli into florets. Toss with olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Spread on a baking sheet and roast at 400Â°F for 20â€“25 minutes until crispy at the edges.
Scrub potatoes and prick with a fork. Rub with oil and salt.
Bake directly on oven rack at 425Â°F for 45â€“60 minutes until soft.
Serve with butter, sour cream, and desired toppings.
